page.title: 15Trade
page.content: {Shops. }One Village shop in the centre stock all needs. {Post Office. } This has over the recent years expanded and now carries not only postal services but food and luxury items. { Halifax Building Society}have recently opened and agency. {Bread Van}brings bread etc from Lydeard St. Lawrence to the Village Shop and to the more isolated homes twice weekly. {Milk }is delivered daily by the paper roundsman to various houses but this is very much a private arrangement. Co-op vans deliver milk on alternate days to a smaller number of houses. {Fish}is sold from a touring van which visits this block once a week.
